title: Broly46
author: Broly46
content: when i was kids, i need to study very hard, to get a lot of score in the test. if i got a zero mark in a math test, i am very scare to go home and show the test paper to my mum. when i am grown up, i have kids and wife now, i need to work very hard, to get a lot of money in the job. if i got a paycut, or i got fired, i am very scared to go home, i can't sleep well, my head is sweating, the memory of getting zero mark in a test keep haunting me like the nightmare, i need to go out and make a lot of money!!tell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: When one feels uncomfortable for not having a good grade in school, it means the person is open to learning more, trying to figure out the reasons for the failure, and at the same time looking for ways to perform better in the next exam. The same thing is applicable to labor; if one gets a low pay on his job, he will definitely want to know the reason for that in order to avoid such a thing happening next time. The same is applicable to being sacked; I know most times the fault might not actually be from the person but come from the employer; they might have one or two reasons to reduce and sack someone. Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMtell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!This statement to me is bad. In a situation like this, you might likely get yourself involved in things that might endanger the very family and kids that you want to do those things for and earn money for in order for them to feed and live comfortably. You just have to change that mindset of being ready to do anything just to make money before the evil teachings of some unlawful and inhuman acts take control over you.

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: Never pressure yourself to provide to your family, it will only stress you out. Having such kind of contented in life makes a good and happy life for you and your family. Never put money first in all things in life because it will only make you more pressure in life and you will forget how to be happy of what you have right now. Focused on happiness instead rather than thinking about the money, not all happiness can be bought by money.

comments.author: Gulttam2a2
comments.body: You can do many things to earn a lot of money. You say business but you say hard work to do your job then you must work hard to do business. If you want to do something you must work hard. Based on your words it is understood that you want to get rich in a short time. But you are not alone you must take care that your family responsibility is still on you. I would say to fix your mind and then you will be able to take right decision. Many times many people take wrong decision in haste hope you are like that. Don't You can buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc on various crypto platforms so that you can sell them at a good price in the future. If you lighten your pressure you will be able to solve all the problems very easily.

comments.author: demonica
comments.body: What I can advise is that, instead of stressing about those things on your own, open up your problems or worries to your wife. Your wife is your support, and she would probably understand your situation. You can't solve things by running away or hiding from it. You need to face it and find a solution to it. I understand that it can be too stressful, especially if you grew up in an environment where you get scared of failing. But you have your own family now, and you as a husband need to be strong mentally. You don't have to put yourself in the situation where you will do wrong things for money. How would your family feel if they find out about it? You can still start over again. Apply and find another job (but not something unethical or unlawful), maybe it would give you a bigger opportunity and higher salary than your previous job. Be positive and everything will be fine.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMtell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!It's not about the money, but about you not having self-confidence. You are too afraid of quantitative values but override how the process. Your mentality has not really formed to be responsible for yourself and even always feel the burden of other people is becoming more in control of your mind. If you are able to be confident in your abilities, and don't complain about what you have produced, the family will accept it as it is.What you feel is just excessive fear, lack of self-confidence, always comparing life with the lives of higher people and the result is as if you are blaming yourself. Get rid of that habit, always think optimistically, and don't expect uncertain results. Do what you have to and produce what you can produce.

That's why it's still good to do good so you can reap good results.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: I think you married wrong person, a royal wife can accept anything bad happen on her husband like got a pay cut or fired, most people only complain why her husband got that, but they forgot if there's no one in this world want to get a pay cut or fired!Money isn't the only thing what's every people want to achieve in this world, but obviously most people choose to become rich than being poor. If your wife is a good person, even you're poor, you both would still able to live happily.

comments.author: Mame89
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMwhen i am grown up, i have kids and wife now, i need to work very hard, to get a lot of money in the job. if i got a paycut, or i got fired, i am very scared to go home, i can't sleep well, my head is sweating, the memory of getting zero mark in a test keep haunting me like the nightmare, i need to go out and make a lot of money!!tell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!Money is only objects and paper that still has an exchange value and there is a time of circulation. The real thing that is stressful is when we are enslaved by money where income is less than expenses. In fact, money will always be lacking as long as we don't have a sense of gratitude, where happiness is not always worth money. how many assets do we have in our bodies, would we exchange one eye for one billion, try to count, so basically money is not a measure of happiness, even though in a materialistic world we always need money, but if we can use the gift of reason, money will come.If it's hard to make money, don't make money. because when you have a hard time making money it means you have lost the competition with people who are also looking for money but they are given 'better' opportunities than you. Don't look for money but seek sustenance from God, because God's sustenance has no limit. What you need to do now, don't feel pressured by your wife, and don't force yourself because that will frustrate and stress you out. Keep trying and stay confident, I'm sure your wife will understand your situation and she will even support and encourage you to keep trying so you don't give up easily.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: i have heard of this from a comedian i think.a man is loved with a condition. if you don't have a job and money, your wife may keep nagging you all day and eventually throw you out of the house for good. but if you have a job and money, you will be loved.this I think is actually wrong because you are a man and you have responsibilities to your family.  a man has to provide for the family. so consider very well to chose a woman that will help you and understand when you go home with less money.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on July 03, 2023, 02:36:31 PMI think you married wrong person, a royal wife can accept anything bad happen on her husband like got a pay cut or fired, most people only complain why her husband got that, but they forgot if there's no one in this world want to get a pay cut or fired!Money isn't the only thing what's every people want to achieve in this world, but obviously most people choose to become rich than being poor. If your wife is a good person, even you're poor, you both would still able to live happily.I also noticed he is under high pressure, especially regards the marriage.As he already has a job I think he should be thankful for that, because there are many people struggling to find one. And to give up on a certain job nowadays for something uncertain, unlawful and unethical is a risky deal that doesn't worth in my opinion.A reasonable solution for now would be his wife to find a job for herself as well, even a freelance, so she can help him carrying the burden of sustaining a house and a family during harsh times where money and opportunities are scarce.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: In this case you're comparing your childhood and household matters, your position is different because now you're the head of the family. But at this point I'm describing your mother as a horrible woman, and the mistake is then you represent that in a financial situation. It's a wonder you can't control what you lead.Sorry if I said a bit harshly, actually your mental coward since childhood. Dude, you'll never run away from the realities of life however you avoid them. Now you're asking us for a solution no matter if it will result in another bigger problem. The question is, if a new problem occurs, where will you avoid? Well, just wait for a villain here to give you a solution.

Sorry man I don't have an advice for someone who is ready to go this path to get money..Have you ever ask yourself what will happen after you get that money? When you don't have money defines yourself and your life and if that changes and people start coming your way that means they are attracted to you because you now have money, it's fake all along.You need love more than money mate, enjoy what you have, think about your kids and your wife, unlawful way of making money will crash all your dreams and hopes for freedom and you will probably end up locked up in a cell. The solution to your problem is YOU..Work on yourself and the way you think, be positive, and start looking for legal ways of making money, you will have peace of mind in life and your kids will thank you for that, if you ruin your name for money, it will affect your children and they have all right to curse you.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMwhen i was kids, i need to study very hard, to get a lot of score in the test. if i got a zero mark in a math test, i am very scare to go home and show the test paper to my mum. when i am grown up, i have kids and wife now, i need to work very hard, to get a lot of money in the job. if i got a paycut, or i got fired, i am very scared to go home, i can't sleep well, my head is sweating, the memory of getting zero mark in a test keep haunting me like the nightmare, i need to go out and make a lot of money!!tell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!The love of money is the root of all evil. Don't love money at the expense of people. Cursed money not worth it, my friend . It's going to make you lose alot, miserable, depressed, foolish, etc. Simply get yourself the Word of GOD( Matthew, Proverbs, etc) and read... Believe in it and do what it says and you will prosper. The secret to prosperity is to sow good seed or do good work in any good business you can find, preferably business you are passionate/talented in...it doesn't matter if it's owed by others. Use the business to solve problems for others... Then, ask the CREATOR to reward you through the business or through any other means, believe HE will answer your prayers and you will be rewarded. The more you sow (or the more good work you do) the more you reap. You don't need to be employed by anyone to benefit from this. Just look for any good business and begin to contribute. Blessings.

comments.author: bitLeap
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMtell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!I understand what you are thinking right now, because most people will definitely experience the same thing. But that doesn't mean we can do anything including things that break the law, that's a form of despair that you are showing here. Now logically, who would believe a desperate person? I think there is no.Surely you will say talking will be easier than experiencing it directly, but we have to look from the positive side. We never know the people who give you input may have experienced the same thing or even more terrible than that.Maybe now we only think about money, because that's what we really need. But can we be sure if we have a lot of money it will give peace? no guarantees about any of that. If that's your problem, I think talking about it with the little family will help a lot, they will definitely understand and believe me we will definitely get enthusiasm that will make us even more excited.

comments.author: umbara ardian
comments.body: It is said that money is the root of all evil and that people become bad as soon as they have money, but to be honest, I see bad people because money is still in the minority; people without money, leading to misery, are innumerable.Once you lack money, you will see the cruelty of the world; once you are short of money, you will truly understand that being rich means having many choices, but if there is no money, there is only one way to go: work hard to earn money.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Broly46 on July 03, 2023, 12:01:00 PMwhen i was kids, i need to study very hard, to get a lot of score in the test. if i got a zero mark in a math test, i am very scare to go home and show the test paper to my mum. A good number of us had such experience growing and this was due to the appetite from our parents on us to be the very best among our peers. That's a lot of pressure am never going to lay on my own kids, it's doesn't bring out the best in a child only fear.Quotewhen i am grown up, i have kids and wife now, i need to work very hard, to get a lot of money in the job. if i got a paycut, or i got fired, i am very scared to go home, i can't sleep well, my head is sweating, the memory of getting zero mark in a test keep haunting me like the nightmare, i need to go out and make a lot of money!!tell me anything i need to do to make a lot of money. doesn't matter what, i would do anything to get all the money, even if it mean unlawful and unethical!There are millions of patriarchs in the society that ain't earning from any good job, yet they're living happily with their family under a contentment lifestyle. A lot of money doesn't guarantee a happy family. So after making the lot of money, then what?If I should tell you something you need to do to make a lot of money. I'll say learn to be contented first cause without contentment there's no amount of money you will make that will seem a lot enough to you. Going unlawful could only send you to serve time in jail ruining your life and those  of your kids. What more fear can there be to that?

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Kids responsibility for their parents is to study well which is sounds easy to others. But if we were on their age it might be tiring and too hard for us. As we grow older, we realized that being a kid is much better than being adult since it's not only about yourself anymore that you'll have to study, but you already have a family to feed for you to do that you'll have to meet up the expectations in the workplace or even in this industry. Still let's be real it can't be helped to get fired or have some salary deductions sine were humans we all make mistakes, I think op you don't need to be scared to your family if this case happens. They are your safe place, they are your home, For any reason for sure they would understand you and they would still support you to find a way to provide for their needs. That's what is family for, by supporting each other. Still financially is something you really need to think if you have a family.

But not all mad people in the streets got mad because of money, there are some who failed to treat themselves in the hospital that lead to madness. I will advise you to follow due process to get rich so that you can live long to fulfill your destiny, and since you are still young to hustle, it will help you to save some money and invest it in BTC or crypto so that you will have hope of a better future.

comments.author: southerngentuk
comments.body: There are many unimaginable sufferings in this world, especially for those who have no money. Their feeling is that they are cautiously walking on thin ice, which makes them exhausted, but they dare not stop.Only someone who is short on money will truly understand that lack of money often means lack of confidence and lack of choice, and that we are not children who can crouch in front of our parents and act awkwardly.If you lack money once, you will understand that, although money is not everything, at least money can make people less miserable.
